#summary New and Noteworthy features in 0.6.0


This is the list of the most important changes made for the 0.6.0 release.

For a complete list, check the [Status] page. 

 * Welcome Mike Poindexter as a new q4e committer.
 * [http://www.eclipse.org/webtools/ Web Tools Platform (WTP)] support, see the [http://joakim.erdfelt.com/q4e/q4e-wtp.swf demo video]
 * Ability to choose which goals get executed during the incremental build.
 * Profile view displays the available and enabled profiles.
 * Files generated by maven are marked _derived_ in eclipse.
 * Dependency management functions (Force Version and Exclude All) available from the [http://code.google.com/p/q4e/wiki/DependencyAnalysis dependency analysis view].
